name: Arlo the Alligator Boy
summary: A young humanoid alligator travels to the big city in hopes of reuniting with his estranged father, meeting a colorful cast of characters along the way.
info:
• 中文名: 鳄鱼男孩阿洛
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: 鳄鱼少年阿洛
  • 上映年度: 2021年4月16日
  • 片长: 90分钟
  • 播放平台: Netflix
  • 导演: Ryan Crego
  • 编剧: Ryan Crego
